src/parallel/ll-src/memalloc.f File Reference

Detailed Description

If FLAG is 1 then memory is allocated for the following common arrays:

  • p (pressure)
  • u (velocity)
  • rho (density)
  • psi (chemical potential)
  • ni (near neighbors)
  • f, fbar (order parameter distribution function)
  • g, gbar (momentum distribution function)
  • gradRhoX (x component of the gradient of the density)
  • gradRhoY (y component of the gradient of the density)
  • gradRhoSq (gradient of the density squared)
  • gradRhoXX (x component of the gradient of the density squared)
  • gradRhoXY (product of the x and y components of the density gradient)
  • gradRhoYY (y component of the gradient of the density squared)

and the buffer arrays required by the parallel D2Q9 Lee-Lin multiphase LBM. Arrays are deallocated when FLAG is different from one.
